root.name: Advanced Dungeons & Dragons Masterpiece Collection
root.description: The Advanced Dungeons Dragons Masterpiece Collection is a compilation of 6 ADD Games on CD-ROM:Al-Qadim: The Genie's Curse (1994)Dark Sun: Shattered Lands (1993)Dark Sun: Wake of the Ravager (1994)Menzoberranzan (1994)Ravenloft: Strahd's Possession (1994)Ravenloft: Stone Prophet (1995)
